Author: ame-chii
Text: yeah i find fasting for short periods of time (or just doing 16:8/20:4 IF) after a binge helps me get back on track and eating cleaner, idk if it’s just me tricking myself into thinking that i’m being healthy but you’re absolutely right! i’m a lot calmer now after thinking it over, and i’m going to eat three healthy meals tomorrow without feeling guilty for eating a normal amt of food. tysm for the encouragement and advice <3

Author: ajioajio_
Text: You weren’t weak, other factors forced you but that doesn’t mean you should be fasting as a quick fix. Please try sure ways to loose weight (even check if you actually need to lose weight).
